needTips: Need some tips on how to begin? Here's a straightforward guide!
step2: Step 2: Gain Points by Doing Things in Real Life
webStep2Text: Now, start tackling your goals from the list! As you complete tasks and check them off in syndromica, you will gain [Experience](http://syndromica.fandom.com/wiki/Experience_Points), which helps you level up, and [Gold](http://syndromica.fandom.com/wiki/Gold_Points), which allows you to purchase Rewards. If you fall into bad habits or miss your Dailies, you will lose [Health](http://syndromica.fandom.com/wiki/Health_Points). In that way, the syndromica Experience and Health bars serve as a fun indicator of your progress toward your goals. You'll start seeing your real life improve as your character advances in the game.
